name: National UFO Reporting Center (NUFORC)
description: A United States organization that investigates UFO sightings and/or alien contacts. It has a comprehensive database of UFO sightings reported across the country.

name: The Mutual UFO Network (MUFON)
description: An international non-profit organization dedicated to the study of UFOs. MUFON maintains an extensive global database of UFO sightings.

name: The Black Vault
description: A massive private collection of declassified government documents, including many related to UFOs, made available by John Greenewald Jr.

name: UAPDb.com
description: A database of news articles, books, cases, conferences, movies, podcasts, tv-series, websites, and YouTube channels related to the UAP topic.

name: Archives for the Unexplained (AFU)
description: A Swedish archive and library for UFOs and related topics.

name: The British UFO Research Association (BUFORA)
description: A British scientifically-oriented organisation dedicated to the investigation and research of the UFO enigma
